name: Delete a pet
description: This test verifies that a pet can be deleted and is no longer retrievable.
descriptionHtml: This test verifies that a pet can be deleted and is no longer retrievable.
statusMessage: AssertionError: Expected API response status code 404, got 200
statusTrace:
pet_api = <shared.rest_api_client.RestApiClient object at 0x1033ad220>, pet_id = 12345

    @allure_annotation(
        "Delete a pet",
        "This test verifies that a pet can be deleted and is no longer retrievable.",
    )
    @pytest.mark.flaky(reruns=5, reruns_delay=1)
    def test_delete_pet(pet_api, pet_id):
        with allure.step("Send request to delete a pet"):
            status_code, _ = pet_api.delete(str(pet_id))
        assert_status_code_is_ok(status_code)
        with allure.step("Send request to get a pet"):
            status_code, _ = pet_api.retrieve(str(pet_id))
>       assert_status_code_is_not_found(status_code)

status_code = 200, expected_status_code = 404

    def assert_status_code(status_code: int, expected_status_code: int):
        with allure.step(f"Verify response status code is {expected_status_code}"):

>               status_code == expected_status_code
            ), f"Expected API response status code {expected_status_code}, got {status_code}"
E           AssertionError: Expected API response status code 404, got 200
